ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | bdcrab.1 | |- Bdd_ A |
| 2 |  | bdcrab.2 | |- Bdd ph |
| 3 | 1 | #P_bdeli | |- Bdd x e. A |
| 4 | 3, 2 | #P_ax-bdan | |- Bdd ( x e. A /\ ph ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_bdcab | |- Bdd_ { x | ( x e. A /\ ph ) } |
| 6 |  | #P_df-rab | |- { x e. A | ph } = { x | ( x e. A /\ ph ) } |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_bdceqir | |- Bdd_ { x e. A | ph } |
